title: 装了沉浸工程之后出现加载mod崩溃的情况
author: shgfcgh
txt_content:
如图所示，加载到3的时候出现的情况，是不是沉浸和工业冲突，如果是请问怎么解决？





QQ图片20190623151509.png
(207.36 KB, 下载次数: 0)




下载附件


2019-6-23 15:16 上传

replies.author: skyliye
replies.txt_content:
net.minecraftforge.fml.common.LoaderExceptionModCrash: Caught exception from Composite Gear (compositegear)
Caused by: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: tws/zcaliptium/compositegear/common/items/ItemCGArmor
        at tws.zcaliptium.compositegear.common.init.ModItems.load(ModItems.java:73)
        at tws.zcaliptium.compositegear.common.CommonProxy.preInit(CommonProxy.java:38)
        at tws.zcaliptium.compositegear.client.ClientProxy.preInit(ClientProxy.java:39)
        at tws.zcaliptium.compositegear.common.CompositeGear.load(CompositeGear.java:107)
Caused by: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: ic2/api/item/IHazmatLike
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.LaunchClassLoader.findClass(LaunchClassLoader.java:182)
        ... 46 more

虽然表面上是这个复合装甲mod导致了问题，但是因为工业2是复合装甲的前置mod，建议先更新工业2
稳定版：https://media.forgecdn.net/files ... 2-2.8.109-ex112.jar
下载人数最多：https://media.forgecdn.net/files ... 2-2.8.152-ex112.jar

建议都试试，哪个好用用哪个

replies.author: skyliye
replies.txt_content: 建议上传完整错误报告

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content: Optifine和光影等一切优化类、光影类Mod删除
